channel.title: NPC Combat Error
channel.description:
Hi guys, I'm currently using Hybridscape and when I add new monsters to 'autospawn.cfg', when I attack them, the client crashes and prints the following error. Can anyone help me resolve this?
[code] java.net.SocketException: Connection reset by peer: socket write error at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(SocketOutputStream.java:92) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(SocketOutputStream.java:136) at ClientHandler.run(ClientHandler.java:612) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662) [/code]
Syrillia

item.title: NPC Combat Error
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Hi guys, I’m currently using Hybridscape and when I add new monsters to ‘autospawn.cfg’, when I attack them, the client crashes and prints the following error. Can anyone help me resolve this?

java.net.SocketException: Connection reset by peer: socket write error
        at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method)
        at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(SocketOutputStream.java:92)
        at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(SocketOutputStream.java:136)
        at ClientHandler.run(ClientHandler.java:612)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)

Syrillia
